"Murriah": "As you are also an ARKS, you must have experienced foes with a gleam of gold and silver, yes?"
"I have recently encountered them at Retem El-Nossa."
"They seemed most fearsome, and in the very instant I formed that thought, they struck..."
"I made a frantic counterattack, but it was no use. I ran for my life."
"Ever since, that horrifying encounter has been seared into my mind... It is a most pitiable story."
"So, could you take them out in my stead once more?"
"I know it is a brazen request to make, but you are the only one I can ask."
